metadata.name: A Return To Paradise
metadata.description:
It is argued that as humans have developed and evolved, they have also become increasingly detached from the natural world. These souls have become nearly omnipresent, inching closer and closer to God.

This piece dabbles with the theory of reintroducing nature in order to maintain humanity. History repeats itself.Â 

Through divine intervention, vegetation and wildlife are restored. Rehabilitating the natural processes that sustain mortality.

We must rediscover a sense of wonder, respect, and reverence for nature.

There will be a burn. You are able to collect 2 editions. 1 to keep, 1 to burn.
